quarks.oplet.plumbing

Class Isolate<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.oplet.core.AbstractOplet<I,O>
      • quarks.oplet.core.Pipe<T,T>
        • quarks.oplet.plumbing.Isolate<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the tuple.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, Consumer<T>, Oplet<T,T>

    public class Isolate<T>
extends Pipe<T,T>
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Isolate upstream processing from downstream processing guaranteeing tuple order. Input tuples are placed at the tail of a queue and dedicated thread removes them from the head and is used for downstream processing.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
